attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The purchase of opium from Afghan farmers would increase support for NATO forces in Afghanistan.  The opium should be processed in Britain and thus solve the shortage of morphine for alleviation of pain. It could also be used to treat addicts and thus reduce the number of crimes they commit in order to fund their habit.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
